name: HongPong
description:
A crappy pong like game with crappy design, crappy physics and basically crappy everything.

Controls: WASD

Note: With every hit on paddle, the ball gets faster and the paddle gets smaller.

I hope you hate it, because I do. After all, I had lost all hopes after 2 hours in Unity trying to figure out how to make the ball move with constant velocity. I don't know, its my second game in 48 hours of game dev. I think I am done with Game Dev.. Bye
